กรุณาใส่เลขที่บัตรประชาชนและตรวจสอบความถูกต้องอีกครั้งก่อนสมัคร เพื่อเป็นการรักษาความปลอดภัยในข้อมูลส่วนบุคคล หลังจากที่ท่านสมัครแล้วจะไม่สามารถเปลี่ยนหรือแก้ไขได้ หากต้องการข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม ติดต่อ support@pointube.com
Last updated: May 18, 2016

These Terms and Conditions of Service ("Terms of Service") govern your account on the Pointube mobile site (the "Pointube Sites" or the "Sites") and your use of the Sites and all products and services provided through the Pointube Sites. Pointube mobile site is operated by New Dimension CO., Ltd. ("Pointube", "we", or "our") and provides the content posted on the Sites subject to the following Terms of Service.

These Terms of Service incorporate the entirety of the Pointube Privacy Policy posted on the Sites. Please read these Terms of Service carefully. By accessing and using the Sites, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these Terms of Service, please do not use the Pointube Sites.

Pointube reserves the right to add to, delete, or change the Terms of Service at any time at its sole discretion, without notice. As such, you should check these Terms of Service from time to time for such changes.
USER ACCOUNTS

Account. If you create a user account for the Sites, you agree to complete the registration process by providing current, complete, and accurate information as required by Pointube. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify Pointube immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security. Pointube will not be liable for any loss that you may incur as a result of someone else using your account, either with or without your knowledge. In addition, you may be held liable for any losses incurred by Pointube or another party due to someone else using your account. You may not use anyone else\'s account at any time.
PRIVACY NOTICE

A copy of Pointube Privacy Policy that applies to the collection, use, disclosure and other processing of personal information by Pointube is posted on the Sites. These Terms of Service incorporate the entirety of the Pointube Privacy Policy. You consent to any personal information we may obtain about you (either via the Pointube Sites, by email, telephone, or any other means) being collected, stored and otherwise processed in accordance with the terms of the Privacy Policy.
SITE CONTENT

The Sites, including without limitation the text, graphics, photographs, software, video and audio content, and the like that appear on the website or mobile site (the "Site Content"), is owned by or licensed to Pointube, and is subject to copyright and other intellectual property rights under Thai Laws. Users may not re-post, republish, reproduce or copy the Site Content to other web sites, mobile applications, or otherwise, without the prior written consent of Pointube. Users cannot sell, or distribute, Site Content to third parties, prepare derivative works of or otherwise exploit Content without the prior written permission of Pointube. To request permission to re-post, republish, reproduce, copy, sell, distribute, prepare derivative works of or otherwise exploit Site Content, please submit your request in writing via service@pointube.com. Pointube has no obligation to grant you permission to re-post, republish, reproduce, copy, sell, distribute, prepare derivative works of or otherwise exploit Site Content. All of the Pointube trademarks, service marks and logos are owned by or licensed to Pointube and may not be used for any purpose without the prior written consent of Pointube.
PERMITTED USES

You agree not to use the Sites in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair any server, or the network(s) connected to any Pointube\' server, or interfere with any other party\'s use and enjoyment of the Sites. You may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Sites, other accounts, computer systems, or networks connected to any Pointube\' server, through hacking, password or data mining, or any other means. You may not obtain or attempt to obtain any materials or information through any means not intentionally made available to you on the Sites. You will not link to any part of the Sites if such activity is illegal, will cause damage to, or will otherwise harm Pointube or any other party. Moreover, Pointube reserves the right in its sole discretion to disable or otherwise terminate your use of the Sites, or any links you make to the Sites, or request you to do the same. Pointube reserves all of its rights in the Pointube Sites not expressly granted to you by these Terms of Service.
REDEMPTIONS POLICY

Pointube promotes the point and mile offers to you but does not guarantee the redemptions provided by the partner loyalty program operators. Pointube is not responsible for the service, eligibility, or termination of the offers.
CLAIM OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

Pointube respects the intellectual property of others. If you believe in good faith that any Site Content, or other matter posted on the Sites infringes the copyright in a work you own, please contact, with correspondence containing the following:
A physical signature of the owner, or a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of the copyright that is allegedly infringed; Identification of the copyrighted work allegedly infringed;
A statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; and

A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

You acknowledge that if you fail to comply with all of the requirements of this Section, your DMCA notice may not be valid. For any questions regarding this procedure, or to submit a complaint, please contact Pointube via service@pointube.com.
LINKS TO OTHER WEBSITES/ MOBILE SITES

The Sites may contain advertisements and/or links to other sites ("Third Party Sites"). These links are provided solely for the convenience of the users. Pointube does not endorse, sanction or verify the accuracy or ownership of the information contained in the advertisements or the content of any Third Party Sites or any products or services advertised on Third Party Sites. If you decide to leave the Sites and navigate to Third Party Sites, or install any applications, software or download content from any such websites or mobile sites, you do so at your own risk. Once you access a Third Party Site through a link on the Pointube Sites, you may no longer be protected by these Terms of Service and you may be subject to the terms of service and other conditions of such Third Party Sites. You should review the applicable terms and policies, including privacy and data gathering practices, of any such site to which you navigate to from the Pointube Sites, or relating to any applications you use or install from such Third Party Sites. Concerns regarding a Third Party Site should be directed to the Third Party Site itself. Pointube bears no responsibility for any action associated with any Third Party Site. Moreover, Pointube does not imply an affiliation with any Third Party Site.
LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

You agree Pointube will not be held liable for any loss or damage incurred as a result of use of the Sites or services. You understand Pointube is not the seller of the goods or services advertised on the Sites. Pointube is a service provider and data handler for partner loyalty program operators. Pointube is not the agent of any partner loyalty program operators and takes no responsibility for the services or products for which partner loyalty program operators provide. Pointube has the right at any time to change, modify, correct, add to, discontinue, or retire any aspect or feature of the Sites, including, but not limited to, hours of availability, equipment needed for access or use, or the availability of the Sites (or any part thereof) on any particular device or communications service. Pointube has no obligation to provide you with notice of any such changes, and Pointube is under no obligation to provide you with any support, error corrections, updates, upgrades, bug fixes, and/or enhancements of the Sites.
INDEMNIFICATION

You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Pointube from all liabilities, claims, damages, losses, and expenses, including attorneys\' fees that arise from your use of the Sites. Pointube reserves the right, at its own expense, to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter otherwise subject to indemnification by you, in which event you will cooperate with Pointube in asserting any available defenses.
ARBITRATION AND JURISDICTION

All disputes arising out of, relating to or connected with these Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, or your use of any part of the Pointube Sites, shall be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration under the Thai law. All disputes in arbitration will be handled solely between the named parties, and not on any representative of class basis. Notwithstanding any other provision of these Terms of Service, to the extent that you have in any manner violated or threatened to violate Pointube\'s intellectual property rights, Pointube reserves the right to seek injunctive or other appropriate relief in any court in Thailand, and you consent to exclusive jurisdiction and venue in such courts.
